entry.title: Testing Github Pages
entry.summary: This is my first attempt to create a github page. This will be an ongoing activity. I used Publii to create and publish this page. It is an awesome open source project for static-website CMS. It has a desktop GUI for creating and editing your…
entry.content:
This is my first attempt to create a github page. This will be an ongoing activity.

I used Publii to create and publish this page. It is an awesome open source project for static-website CMS. It has a desktop GUI for creating and editing your contents and allows you to publish directly to github.

I am still exploring the options and tools of this awesome desktop tool. I will write more posts soon.
